name: Live While You're Alive EP
description:
Order the 5-song EP we recorded in the fall of 2010 with producer Brian Steckler. We wrote these songs without an agenda, or much of a filter, and hope that their honesty will resonate with the truths that life may have caused you to forget. Above all, we want these songs to offer you hope. Life, full of pain and triumph, is beautiful, remember that! 

Tracks include:
I Wanna Know You
Dark Outside
Be Here
Rubbish
Life is Beautiful 

Digital downloads of individual songs or the EP in its entirety is available at:
www.themusicroom.bandcamp.com 
Gracias!
